channel.title: C++ on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Life Reboot

item.title: Chrysalis Update for 2020-08-02
item.description: In this article I will cover recent progress on my project, Chrysalis.

item.title: Adding EnTT ECS to Chrysalis
item.description: In this article I will discuss the process I followed and the results of integrating the EnTT Entity Component System (ECS) into Chrysalis.

item.title: Switching to CRYENGINE 5.3 New Entity System
item.description: In this article I will cover the changes I made to Chrysalis for the release of CRYENGINE 5.3. Some were required due to old code being deprecated, others were simply improvements over the previous way of doing things.

item.title: First Person and Action RPG Cameras
item.description: In this article I will introduce you to view management within CRYENGINE and then use the existing view management to build a camera manager, a first person camera and a third person orbit camera (action RPG style).

item.title: Controlling an Animated Character in CRYENGINE using C++
item.description: Making an animated character move around the screen in CRYENGINE requires many thousands of lines of code and a lot of time and dedication. This series of articles will show you how to control a character animated in CRYENGINE Mannequin using C++ code.

item.title: Adding New Actions to CryEngine 3 FreeSDK
item.description: This tutorial will help you add new actions into CryEngine 3 FreeSDK projects without needing to make any changes to the base code provided by CryTek.
